body: spack's ncurses package uses ```--enable-widec``` which builds ncursesw and suppresses building of ncurses and curses libraries. widec support was added tmux in this January 19 [commit](https://github.com/tmux/tmux/commit/61af9d7cc27f9999e4f6e3dab9f786a074a97dee) which post-dates v2.3 by several months.
title: tmux 2.3 cannot use ncurses package
